snippet.title: Tiny Archers - Official Gameplay Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Here's your look at gameplay from Tiny Archers in this trailer for the upcoming VR bow-fighting action game. The trailer showcases bow and arrow action as a tiny archer takes down goblins, crafts special arrows with magical abilities, and defends a tower. Additionally, join Tiny Archers' producer Theodore Reiker for a look at the Artemis smart bow that comes in partnership with 1DER Entertainment and Wonder Fitter. A Kickstarter campaign is available for the Artemis smart bow. Tiny Archers is available now in Early Access on Meta Quest App Lab, with a full release also available in April 2024 on Steam VR and Pico.
